QueryResult.text: SELECT P.ID, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, P.PERMISSION_CODE, NLS.NAME PERMISSION_NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION, P.IS_SYSTEM, P.IS_ACTIVE, P.CREATED_DATE, P.CREATED_BY, P.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, P.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS P WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS' AND NLS.PK_ID = P.ID
